column4: while i trying to upgrade to feisty from a cdrom i get the error:
Sub-process gpgv returned an error code (2), W:Signature verification failed for: /cdrom/dists/feisty/Release.gpg
how do I fix it? its a install cd for feisty
did you check the cd for errors
it may be then that there is an error on the cd .... when you boot up from t initially use the menu option to validate the cd
i'll try that, but still can i use the CD partially to update some of the packages, my Internet connection is slow, and can't afford to download the iso image once again
did you download and burn the cd originally?
thanks a lot, will try that
always check urnt cds before trying to install or upgrade from them
the cd has no errors, i verified the integrity of it,
this is the error which I get: Sub-process gpgv returned an error code (2), W:Signature verification failed for: /cdrom/dists/feisty/Release.gpg
.... sorry i cannot help with that issue ...
